text: 12 Tónar is a small record shop in Reykjavík, Iceland, and also a record label for Icelandic indie bands. It is found on Skólavörðustígur 15, in downtown Reykjavík. == Related pages == * List of record labels ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Independent record labels Category:Indie music record labels Category:1998 establishments in Europe Category:Reykjavík Category:20th-century establishments in Iceland
title: 12 Tónar
